annotations.description: This is what football should look like. Full of action, thrilling moments and spectacular opportunities. The expectations for the next games will be high. The superiority of the away team was evident on the pitch today. Both teams attempted to play possession football.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Denis Cheryshev sends a precise lofted cross into the box. Marcelo (Real Madrid) latches on to it and finishes with a quick shot inside the left post. The goalkeeper had no chance. The score changes to 1:3.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nolito (Celta Vigo) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will send the ball into the penalty box.
Duran Nolito (Celta Vigo) whips the ball in from the long range free kick, but the first man gets it clear. Celta Vigo will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
Neat link up play between Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) and Cristiano Ronaldo, but Sergio Alvarez reads the game well and the move breaks down.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 5 min. of added time.
The Real Madrid players are exchanging some short passes.

John Guidetti (Celta Vigo) receives a precise pass on the edge of the box and bends his effort inches wide of the left post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Real Madrid.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Nolito (Celta Vigo) scores with a great individual effort! He makes a good run, skips past defenders and fires the ball from the edge of the box past the diving goalkeeper. The shot went into the top left corner. Absolutely phenomenal!

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: We are about to witness a substitution. John Guidetti (Celta Vigo) is replacing Fabian Orellana.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Pablo Pedro Hernandez makes way for Carles Planas (Celta Vigo).

annotations.description: Substitution. Luka Modric (Real Madrid) did his best and is replaced by Nacho.
Duran Nolito (Celta Vigo) tries to find Iago Aspas, but he puts too much power on the pass.

Keylor Navas (Real Madrid) hasn't suffered any serious injury which would see him leave the pitch. He's back in the game now.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The ball is whipped in from the corner by Fabian Orellana (Celta Vigo), but one of the defenders gets it clear.

Pablo Pedro Hernandez (Celta Vigo) delivers a fine lofted cross into the penalty area, but it's cleared by an opposing player. Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

Nolito (Celta Vigo) bursts into the box and pulls the trigger, but he can't beat the goalkeeper. He directed his low drive towards the middle of the goal, but one of the defenders reacted brilliantly to block it.

Isco (Real Madrid) finds himself with a great opportunity! He unleashes a shot from the edge of the box, which whizzes just wide of the left post! The ball goes out of play and Celta Vigo will have a goal kick.
Nolito (Celta Vigo) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Jese will be replaced by Denis Cheryshev (Real Madrid).

What a great touch by Isco (Real Madrid) after latching on to a precise pass on the edge of the box! He finds some space and rips a shot close to the left post. The goalkeeper makes an astonishing save, knocking the ball onto the post.

annotations.label: substitution

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) puts a cross into the box from the corner but there is no panic from the opposition and they easily clear.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) gets on the end of a pass and takes a shot from the edge of the box, but it's blocked by one of the defending players. The ball goes out for a corner. Real Madrid can continue in their attacking effort.
A neat pass is well received by , who is lurking on the edge of the box and strikes the ball on goal. The goalkeeper makes a decent save to block his shot.
Duran Nolito (Celta Vigo) gives away a foul for a fierce tackle on an opponent.

Good touch by Daniel Wass (Celta Vigo) as he receives a great pass and attempts to threaten the goalkeeper with his long range strike. Unfortunately for him, the effort misses the net and flies well wide to the right. The ball goes out of play and Real Madrid will have a goal kick.
An accurate pass to the edge of the box is well taken by Fabian Orellana (Celta Vigo), whose instinctive shot towards goal flashes inches wide of the right post.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half gets underway.

This is how football should be full of action, thrilling moments and spectacular opportunities. And we have only had the first 45 minutes, so the expectations for the second half are high. The away side are dominant and dictating the tempo of the game, mainly because of their higher activity and more accurate passing. Both teams are attempting to hold onto the ball for as long as possible.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
Iago Aspas almost found himself in a promising position after Daniel Wass (Celta Vigo) tried to send a defence splitting pass, but one of the defenders reacts well and makes a timely interception.

Danilo (Real Madrid) knocks his opponent down with an over the top tackle.
Real Madrid control the tempo of the game by exchanging some accurate short passes.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) crosses into the box from near the side line, but he doesn't connect as he wanted and it's cleared by the well organized defence.
Keylor Navas pulls off a great save to deny Fabian Orellana (Celta Vigo), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick shot towards the middle of the goal.
